Document.label: Mobile Marketing 101: Chapter 3: Mobile Handsets: Basic,Feature and Smartphones
Document.target: BU CMM, BU OMM, SO CMM, SO OMM, NSO reviewer, CIM, Asset manager, PFS user
Document.topics: In this chapter,we will be discussing basic,feature and smartphones: what services they provide as well as insight into how they can be utilised as a profitable medium for advertisers and marketers.
